title: Monarchs and Maestros Hub
content:
=====
[[include component:preview
text=From one death to another.
]]
=====

[[div style="display: none;"]]
[[include component:image-block
| name=MaM-Thumbnail.png
| caption=THUMBNAIL
| width=100%
| align=center]]
tags: hub, doctor-kondraki
[[/div]]

[[include :scp-wiki:theme:black-highlighter-theme]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:centered-header-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:toggle-sidebar-bhl]]
[[include :scp-wiki:component:fade-in speed=1]]

[[module css]]

:root {
    --red: 45, 100, 44;
	 --medium-accent: var(--red);
	 --cutColour: #fafafa;
	 --barColour: var(--red);
	 --toggle-border-color: rgb(var(--red));
	 --toggle-icon-color: rgb(var(--red));
	 --mono-font: 'IBM Plex Mono', monospace;
	 --dark-accent: var(--red);
	 --barColour: var(--red);
	 --bright-accent: var(--red);

	 --link-color: 55, 122, 54;
	 --visited-link-color: 45, 100, 44;
	 --hover-link-color: 45, 100, 44;

    --logo-image: url("https://nu-scptheme.github.io/Black-Highlighter/img/logo.svg");

--toggle-roundness: 0%;
}

 #page-title{
     display: none;
}

.cut-up {
    background: #FAFAFA;
    box-shadow: 0px 0px 5px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.5);
    width: 90%;
    margin-left: auto;
    margin-right: auto;
    padding: 0px 20px 0px 20px;
    word-break: break-word;
}

[[/module]]

[[=]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/=]]

@@ @@

[[=image MonarchsandMaestros.png]]

@@ @@

[[=image Kondraki-Header.png width="100%" style="border: 1px solid #3B5C0A;"]]

@@ @@

[[div class="cut-up"]]

[[=image dotted-line-top.png]]

Once, there was a man who died for only a moment. Years later he would die again, as all men must.

From one death to another, this is the story of everything that happened between.

[[=image dotted-line-bottom.png]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@

[[div class="cut-up"]]

[[=image dotted-line-top.png]]

[[=]]
++++ Act 1: Paper Chimeras
[[/=]]

**Chapter 1:** [[[SCP-7408 | SCP-7408 - Metamorphosis]]]

**Chapter 2:** [[[DR. KONDRAKI CUT UP WHILE THINKING]]]

**Chapter 3:** [[[Six Codas]]]

**Chapter 4:** [[[A Betamax Suicide Note]]]

**Chapter 5:** Assemblage

**Chapter 6:** Secure Facility Dossier: Site-17

**Chapter 7:** Per My Previous Email

**Chapter 8:** Moving Day

[[=image dotted-line.png]]

**Interlude 1:** Project Proposal 2004-19: “Flesh Wrapped About the Armature of Time”

**Interlude 2:** The Iceberg Exchange

[[=image dotted-line-bottom.png]]

[[/div]]

@@ @@
